alkene_to_alkane.description: Hydrogenation of C=C double bond to single bond

alkyne_to_alkene.description: Partial hydrogenation of C≡C triple bond to double bond (cis/trans depends on catalyst)

alkyne_to_alkane.description: Full hydrogenation of C≡C triple bond to single bond

aldehyde_to_primary_alcohol.description: Reduction of aldehyde to primary alcohol

ketone_to_secondary_alcohol.description: Reduction of ketone to secondary alcohol

carboxylic_acid_to_primary_alcohol.description: Reduction of carboxylic acid to primary alcohol

ester_to_alcohols.description: Reduction of ester to primary alcohol and alcohol from alkyl part

nitrile_to_primary_amine.description: Reduction of nitrile to primary amine

imine_to_secondary_amine.description: Reduction of imine to secondary amine

oxime_to_amine.description: Reduction of oxime to amine (removal of =O)

enamine_to_amine.description: Reduction of enamine double bond to single bond

iminium_to_amine.description: Reduction of iminium ion to amine

nitro_to_primary_amine.description: Reduction of nitro group to primary amine

aromatic_ring_to_cyclohexane.description: Hydrogenation of aromatic ring to cyclohexane

ketone_to_secondary_alcohol_rfb.description: Reduction of ketone to secondary alcohol

viologen_dication_to_radical.description: One-electron reduction of viologen dication to radical cation

phenazine_to_dihydrophenazine.description: Two-electron reduction of phenazine to dihydrophenazine

phenothiazine_to_dihydrophenothiazine.description: Two-electron reduction of phenothiazine to dihydrophenothiazine

quinoxaline_to_dihydroquinoxaline.description: Two-electron reduction of quinoxaline to dihydroquinoxaline

benzophenone_to_diphenylmethanol.description: Reduction of ketone to secondary alcohol

nitroxide_to_hydroxylamine.description: Reduction of nitroxide radical to hydroxylamine (TEMPO-H type)

imide_to_hydroimide.description: Reduction of imide group to hydroimide

aromatic_nitroso_to_hydroxylamine.description: Reduction of aromatic nitroso to hydroxylamine

alloxazine_to_hydroalloxazine.description: Reduction of alloxazine to its reduced form

benzophenone_derivatives_to_reduced.description: Reduction of various benzophenone derivatives to their corresponding reduced forms

naphthalene_derivatives_to_reduced.description: Reduction of naphthalene derivatives to their corresponding reduced forms

pyrene_derivatives_to_reduced.description: Reduction of pyrene derivatives to their corresponding reduced forms
